fullplot: Concentration camp Buchenwald, end of March 1945. Inmate Hans Pippig discovers in a carrying case of an incoming prisoner a Jewish infant. If reported the three-year-old is dedicated to the death. On the other hand, a violation of the provisions of the camp threatens the long prepared uprising of concentration camp prisoners against the SS.

title: Naked Among Wolves
